summary.span: 讀取組態檔的 [deviceFilters Element (ASP.NET 設定結構描述)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2fb323b9-675b-48de-861b-8998fa0c51ba) 區段，該區段會指定要與 ASP.NET 行動控制項搭配使用的裝置篩選條件集合。

span.span: Reads the [deviceFilters Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2fb323b9-675b-48de-861b-8998fa0c51ba) section of a configuration file that specifies the set of device filters for use with ASP.NET mobile controls.

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

permission.span: 用於裝載環境中的作業。

span.span: for operating in a hosted environment.
Demand value: ; Permission value: .

para.span: 繼承的類別的執行個體類別必須是安全且無狀態的執行緒。

span.span: Instances of classes that inherit the class must be thread safe and stateless.

para.span: 方法同時必須可從多個執行緒呼叫。

span.span: The method must be callable from multiple threads simultaneously.

para.span: 請參閱如有關繼承的詳細資訊。

span.span: See for more information about inheriting.
